LanguageData.Settings.BigGunLabel: Say hello to my little friend.
LanguageData.Settings.ILoveBigGunsTooltip: Big is good, big is reliable. If it doesn't work, you can always hit 'em with it.
LanguageData.Settings.SizeDoesMatterTooltip: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way. \nRobert Kiyosaki
